title: Takes Me Away
author: Joh
citation: Joh. "Takes Me Away: experience with Tobacco - Cigarettes (ID 32805)". Erowid.org. Jun 4, 2006. erowid.org/exp/32805
report: Well, I'm not a smoker. So nicotine hits me quite hard. One day I was quite nervous and I took a cig from a friend of mine and smoked it in 1 minute or so. After throwing away the filter the nicotine hit me. I was really fucked! My cordination was fucked, I saw many colors, I just felt GOOD! The nicotine buzz is cool, but when I am addicted to nicotine, I just need it. I don't feel anything like that anymore.
